title: The Recruit: Book Three
description: “His bite changed me forever. I’m stronger, faster…deadlier. The moon calls to me now, and I cannot resist its sweet song.”The vampire uprising has been crushed and their leader destroyed by Hannah’s blade. But their victory over the leeches is not without sacrifice. Unexpected changes arise in the recruit program, a sword master loses his will to fight and a Lycan, desperate to save the life of the woman he loves, sends her down a dangerous and unrecognizable path.Overwhelmed by her new powers, Hannah distances herself from her loved ones. As her powers grow and the moon sings its relentless call, will she abandon her human side forever?Please note - this is the Book Three of the popular “Recruit” series. Books One and Two MUST be read first in order to understand the events of Book Three.Author’s Note: This book contains explicit and steamy sex scenes that may not be your cup of tea. It is intended for adult readers only.
author: Elizabeth   Kelly
